data.name: Surviving West
data.detailed_description:
SURVIVING WEST



Surviving West takes you to a beautiful world with many things to do and locations to discover. A peaceful and calm start with focus on building and surviving. When you are ready you can explore the world and find its treasures. In Surviving West you decide.. but be prepared for everything.

Core features and game mechanics in

Surviving West Patch v1.0

Modular Building
Be creative while building using one of the multiple building materials available.

Wild animals and enemies
Scattered around the world you will find wild animals. Kill them for food and the potential of loot. But beware of other enemies lurking around.

Farming
Ensure you never run out of food by planting and farming your own food supply.

Single and Multiplayer Support
You can decide if you want to play with friends or solo. You can even start a public server for others to join.

Character needs
Your character needs food and water to stay alive. Different food contains different nutrients. It's vital that you keep your Protein, Carbs, Fat and Vitamin levels high.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
